securityStatus.allSecurityFeaturesAreActive: All security features are active and protecting your data

analogies.endToEndEncryption: Like a sealed envelope that only you and your family can open
analogies.europeanDataCenters: Like storing your valuables in a secure facility that follows strict European standards
analogies.localOnlyPrivacyMode: Like keeping your most important documents in a home safe
analogies.multiFactorAuthentication: Like having multiple locks on your front door
analogies.secureCloudStorage: Like a bank vault with multiple security systems and backup locations
analogies.zeroKnowledgeArchitecture: Like a safety deposit box where even the bank doesn't know what's inside

explanations.endToEndEncryption: Your data is encrypted before it leaves your device and can only be decrypted by you and your designated family members.
explanations.europeanDataCenters: All data is stored in EU-based data centers, ensuring compliance with GDPR and European privacy laws.
explanations.localOnlyPrivacyMode: Process sensitive documents locally on your device without sending any data to our servers.
explanations.multiFactorAuthentication: Multiple verification methods ensure only you and your trusted family members can access your legacy.
explanations.secureCloudStorage: Your encrypted data is stored in secure, redundant cloud infrastructure with multiple layers of protection.
explanations.zeroKnowledgeArchitecture: We cannot access your encrypted data - only you and your designated family members have the keys.

familyBenefits.endToEndEncryption: Your family can access your legacy securely, even if our systems are compromised.
familyBenefits.europeanDataCenters: Your family's data is protected by the strongest privacy laws in the world.
familyBenefits.localOnlyPrivacyMode: Your family can process sensitive documents without any external access or monitoring.
familyBenefits.multiFactorAuthentication: Your family can be confident that only authorized people can access your legacy.
familyBenefits.secureCloudStorage: Your family's access to your legacy is never interrupted, even during emergencies.
familyBenefits.zeroKnowledgeArchitecture: Your family can trust that your legacy is truly private and secure.

securityStatus.yourTrustIsOurHighestPriority: Your trust is our highest priority
